CellMappingHcal.hh

00001 #ifndef CellMapping_h
00002 #define CellMapping_h 1
00003 
00004 #include <string>
00005 #include <cmath>
00006 
00007 #include "lcio.h"
00008 #include "UTIL/LCFixedObject.h"
00009 
00010 #define NUMINT 2 
00011 #define NFLMAP 0
00012 #define NDOUBLE 0
00013 
00014 
00015 #define CRATESHIFT 24
00016 #define SLOTSHIFT 16 
00017 #define FESHIFT 12
00018 #define MULSHIFT 4
00019 #define ADCSHIFT 0
00020 
00021 #define ICOORDSHIFT 16
00022 #define JCOORDSHIFT 8
00023 #define KCOORDSHIFT 0
00024 
00025 
00026 using namespace lcio ;
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 //class CellMappingHcal ;
00030 
00031 namespace CALICE {
00032 
00040 class CellMappingHcal : public LCFixedObject<NUMINT,NFLMAP,NDOUBLE> {
00041   
00042 public: 
00043   
00046   CellMappingHcal(int icrate, int islot, int ife , int imul, int iadc, int icoord, int jcoord , int kcoord) {
00047 
00048     int elec_channel = (icrate << CRATESHIFT) | ( islot << SLOTSHIFT ) | 
00049       ( ife << FESHIFT) | ( imul << MULSHIFT) | (iadc << ADCSHIFT);
00050     int cellID = (icoord << ICOORDSHIFT) | (jcoord << JCOORDSHIFT) | (kcoord << KCOORDSHIFT) ;
00051 
00052     obj()->setIntVal( 0 , elec_channel  ) ;
00053     obj()->setIntVal( 1 , cellID  ) ;
00054     //obj()->setFloatVal( 0 ,  offset ) ;  
00055     //obj()->setFloatVal( 1 ,  gain ) ;  
00056   }
00057 
00060   CellMappingHcal(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NUMINT,NFLMAP,NDOUBLE>(obj) { } 
00061 
00063   virtual ~CellMappingHcal() { /* no op*/  }
00064   
00065 
00068   int getElecChannel()   { return obj()->getIntVal(0) ;  } 
00069   int getCellID()   { return obj()->getIntVal(1) ;  } 
00070 
00073   short getCellIndex(std::string);   
00074   short getCrateID() { return ( ( obj()->getIntVal(0) >> CRATESHIFT ) & 0xff );  }
00075   short getSlotID() { return ( ( obj()->getIntVal(0) >> SLOTSHIFT ) & 0xff );  }
00076   //These masks are particularly ugly !!!
00077   short getFeID() { return ( ( ( obj()->getIntVal(0) & 0xffff) >> FESHIFT ) & 0xff);  }
00078   short getMulID() { return ( ( ( obj()->getIntVal(0) & 0xfff ) >> MULSHIFT ) & 0xff );  }
00079   short getAdcID() { return ( ( ( obj()->getIntVal(0) & 0xf ) >> ADCSHIFT ) & 0xff );  }
00080 
00081   
00083   void print(  std::ostream& os ) ;
00084   
00085 
00086   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00087 
00089   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00090     return"Cell_MappingHcal" ;
00091   } 
00092   
00096   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00097     return "i:elec_channel,i:cellID" ;
00098   }
00099 
00100 private:
00102   short _index;
00103 
00104 }; // class
00105 
00106 }
00107 #endif
